Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Houston in 1970...
Traded from Houston to Cincinnati on 4/1/1972 (Going to HOU: P J. Maloney, 3B T. Perez, 1B L. May. Going to CIN: P J. Denny, P F. Cambria, 1B H. Kato, P R. Corbin, RF T. Armas Sr.)...
Injured on 7/14/1973 with a Tight Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/2/1975 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 4/2/1977...
Injured on 6/8/1977 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 5/6/1979 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for full season...
Traded from Cincinnati to Cleveland on 1/31/1982 (Going to CIN: CF D. Cripe. Going to CLE: P J. Denny)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1983, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
